name: Engineer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Engineer has not used their ability: The Engineer either shows a 'no' head shake or points to Minion/Demon character tokens. If characters are chosen, replace the existing Minions or Demon with the chosen ones.

otherNights.description: Once per game, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

information.customMessage: Choose a Minion or Demon character to replace the current one.
